languages.text: "Надежда напрасна, мечтания преждевременны. Шансы на выживание возросли незначительно... пока что".
"Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."
languages.original_text: "Надежда напрасна, мечтания преждевременны. Шансы на выживание возросли незначительно... пока что".

traits.locale_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “希望是不切实际的，幻想是天真幼稚的，但就目前而言……我们存活下来的几率确实微微提高了一点点。”
languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: “希望是不切实际的，幻想是天真幼稚的，但就目前而言……我们存活下来的几率确实微微提高了一点点。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « À ce stade, tout espoir est injustifié, et tout rêve prématuré. Nos chances de survie ont très légèrement augmenté... pour le moment. »
languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: « À ce stade, tout espoir est injustifié, et tout rêve prématuré. Nos chances de survie ont très légèrement augmenté... pour le moment. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La esperanza es injustificada y los sueños, prematuros. Nuestras probabilidades de supervivencia han mejorado ligeramente... por ahora».
languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: «La esperanza es injustificada y los sueños, prematuros. Nuestras probabilidades de supervivencia han mejorado ligeramente... por ahora».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「望みに保証などない、夢半ばだ。生存の可能性は微増した…差し当たりだが」
languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: 「望みに保証などない、夢半ばだ。生存の可能性は微増した…差し当たりだが」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hoffnung ist unangebracht, Träume sind verfrüht. Unsere Überlebenschancen haben sich marginal verbessert ... vorerst."
languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffnung ist unangebracht, Träume sind verfrüht. Unsere Überlebenschancen haben sich marginal verbessert ... vorerst."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

languages.text: "Umudun sağlam temelleri yok, hayaller ise vakitsizdir. Hayatta kalma olasılığımız, şimdilik minimum miktarda arttı."
languages.original_text: "Hope is unwarranted, dreams are premature. Our chances of survival have increased marginally... for now."

traits.locale_text: "Umudun sağlam bir temeli yok, hayaller ise vakitsiz. Hayatta kalma olasılığımız minimum miktarda arttı. Şimdilik..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
